channel.title: 668 loading 711 server help
channel.description:
I have fixed all trading glitces and everything and i want to move home now so
how would i change the home tele and make it so all new chars would spawn at middle of grand exchange
also how would i move npc like bob, makeover mage general shop owner

item.title: 668 loading 711 server help
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Change home: Go to Settings.java and search,

Change the WorldTile value to the coords you want (X, Y, Z).

If you want to move an NPC you could go to: data/npcs, open unpackedSpawnslist and write NPCID - XCOORD YCOORD ZCOORD
(change the letters to numbers), put your packedSpawns folder somewhere like desktop, and then compile and run the server.

Read full topic

item.title: 668 loading 711 server help
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

[quote=“zingerman111, post:1, topic:440002”]I have fixed all trading glitces and everything and i want to move home now so

how would i change the home tele and make it so all new chars would spawn at middle of grand exchange[/quote]
To move the home look within your server.java I believe. And the home tele would have to be modified from the spell book tele? Or if it’s a Quest Tab Tele look within the Quest Tab handler and change the X and Y co-ords to the wanted location!

Read full topic
